rules_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, scry 1 and put a shatter counter on Shatter the Heavens. If 5 or more mana was spent to cast it, draw a card and put an additional shatter counter on Shatter the Heavens.
When Shatter the Heavens has ten or more shatter counters on it, sacrifice it. When you do, create Megi'Yharun, a legendary 10/10 black Weird creature token with flying, indestructible and “When this creature attacks, exile target permanent.”
